root: ^A cloudy green mist coalesces in the air before you. After a few seconds, a familiar and slightly annoyed voice addresses you. "Ah, [[class]] - how can my arcane abilities aid you in your quest?"

c-0: ^Memorizing a card will make it Memorized. Cards with this property get shuffled to the top of your deck at the start of combat.
^Imbuing an Enchantment is a powerful but expensive process that allows you to have an enchantment from your deck be active permanently.
^The Enchantment card must already be present in your deck, must last longer than a round in order to be imbued, and will be destroyed in the process.
